Plot
Andie MacDowell portrays a woman who is tormented by the ghost of her abusive, 
alcoholic husband. She must come to terms with the past if she is to find 
peace and love. Samuel le Bihan is a French engineer who she finds renewed love 
with and Tim Roth plays her deceased husband who shows us that hate can live on 
after death. Perhaps forgiveness is the only way to overcome the demons that 
haunt us from the grave.
